posts.post_content:
I've got some money from recent sales I'd like to reinvest in this board, including these T206 Red Sox players...

I'm looking for SGC holders, preferred grade of 40, but some flexibility - particularly lower grades.

I also want different backs for each card (currently have Old Mill, Piedmont, Sovereign and SC on others, so those are out).

Frank Arellanes
Bill Carrigan
Eddie Cicotte
Red Kleinow
Harry Lord
[STRIKE]Tubby Spencer
[/STRIKE]Jake Stahl (glove showing)
[STRIKE]Heinie Wagner (bat on right)
[/STRIKE]Heinie Wagner (bat on left)

Also looking for a Tris Speaker in SGC with a back not listed above, but a bit lower grade.

Feel free to PM me or email me at [url]garthguibord@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks!
